title: Generate Module Federation Setup for Angular App
description: Create Module Federation configuration files for given Angular Application.

appName.description: The name of the application to generate the Module Federation configuration for.
appName.x-prompt: What app would you like to generate a Module Federation configuration for?

mfeType.description: Type of application to generate the Module Federation configuration for.

port.description: The port at which the remote application should be served.

remotes.description: A list of remote application names that the host application should consume.

host.description: The name of the host application that the remote application will be consumed by.

routing.description: Generate a routing setup to allow a host application to route to the remote application.

skipFormat.description: Skip formatting the workspace after the generator completes.
